<S>1161</S> In<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S> came<S>3854</S> John<S>2491</S> the Baptist<S>910</S>, preaching<S>2784</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S> of Judaea<S>2449</S>,
And<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S>, Repent ye<S>3340</S>: for<S>1063</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is at hand<S>1448</S>.
For<S>1063</S> this<S>3778</S> is he<S>2076</S> that was spoken<S>4483</S> of by<S>5259</S> the prophet<S>4396</S> Esaias<S>2268</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, The voice<S>5456</S> of one crying<S>994</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, Prepare ye<S>2090</S> the way<S>3598</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, make<S>4160</S> his<S>846</S> paths<S>5147</S> straight<S>2117</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the same<S>846</S> John<S>2491</S> had<S>2192</S> his<S>846</S> raiment<S>1742</S> of<S>575</S> camel's<S>2574</S> hair<S>2359</S>, and<S>2532</S> a leathern<S>1193</S> girdle<S>2223</S> about<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> loins<S>3751</S>; and<S>1161</S> his<S>846</S> meat<S>5160</S> was<S>2258</S> locusts<S>200</S> and<S>2532</S> wild<S>66</S> honey<S>3192</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> went out<S>1607</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> Judaea<S>2449</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the region round about<S>4066</S> Jordan<S>2446</S>,
And<S>2532</S> were baptized<S>907</S> of<S>5259</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> Jordan<S>2446</S>, confessing<S>1843</S> their<S>846</S> sins<S>266</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when he saw<S>1492</S> many<S>4183</S> of the Pharisees<S>5330</S> and<S>2532</S> Sadducees<S>4523</S> come<S>2064</S> to<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> baptism<S>908</S>, he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, O generation<S>1081</S> of vipers<S>2191</S>, who<S>5101</S> hath warned<S>5263</S> you<S>5213</S> to flee<S>5343</S> from<S>575</S> the wrath<S>3709</S> to come<S>3195</S>?
Bring forth<S>4160</S> therefore<S>3767</S> fruits<S>2590</S> meet<S>514</S> for repentance<S>3341</S>: <sup>meet: or, answerable to amendment of life</sup>
And<S>2532</S> think<S>1380</S> not<S>3361</S> to say<S>3004</S> within<S>1722</S> yourselves<S>1438</S>, We have<S>2192</S> Abraham<S>11</S> to our father<S>3962</S>: for<S>1063</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> is able<S>1410</S> of<S>1537</S> these<S>5130</S> stones<S>3037</S> to raise up<S>1453</S> children<S>5043</S> unto Abraham<S>11</S>.
And<S>1161</S> now<S>2235</S> also<S>2532</S> the axe<S>513</S> is laid<S>2749</S> unto<S>4314</S> the root<S>4491</S> of the trees<S>1186</S>: therefore<S>3767</S> every<S>3956</S> tree<S>1186</S> which bringeth<S>4160</S> not<S>3361</S> forth<S>4160</S> good<S>2570</S> fruit<S>2590</S> is hewn down<S>1581</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the fire<S>4442</S>.
I<S>1473</S> indeed<S>3303</S> baptize<S>907</S> you<S>5209</S> with<S>1722</S> water<S>5204</S> unto<S>1519</S> repentance<S>3341</S>: but<S>1161</S> he that cometh<S>2064</S> after<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S> is<S>2076</S> mightier than<S>2478</S> I<S>3450</S>, whose<S>3739</S> shoes<S>5266</S> I am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> worthy<S>2425</S> to bear<S>941</S>: he<S>846</S> shall baptize<S>907</S> you<S>5209</S> with<S>1722</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> with fire<S>4442</S>:
Whose<S>3739</S> fan<S>4425</S> is in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S>, and<S>2532</S> he will throughly purge<S>1245</S> his<S>846</S> floor<S>257</S>, and<S>2532</S> gather<S>4863</S> his<S>846</S> wheat<S>4621</S> into<S>1519</S> the garner<S>596</S>; but<S>1161</S> he will burn up<S>2618</S> the chaff<S>892</S> with unquenchable<S>762</S> fire<S>4442</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> cometh<S>3854</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> from<S>575</S> Galilee<S>1056</S> to<S>1909</S> Jordan<S>2446</S> unto<S>4314</S> John<S>2491</S>, to be baptized<S>907</S> of<S>5259</S> him<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> John<S>2491</S> forbad<S>1254</S> him, saying<S>3004</S>, I<S>1473</S> have<S>2192</S> need<S>5532</S> to be baptized<S>907</S> of<S>5259</S> thee<S>4675</S>, and<S>2532</S> comest<S>2064</S> thou<S>4771</S> to<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>?
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Suffer<S>863</S> it to be so now<S>737</S>: for<S>1063</S> thus<S>3779</S> it becometh<S>4241</S> <S>2076</S> us<S>2254</S> to fulfil<S>4137</S> all<S>3956</S> righteousness.<S>1343</S> Then<S>5119</S> he suffered<S>863</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, when he was baptized<S>907</S>, went up<S>305</S> straightway<S>2117</S> out of<S>575</S> the water<S>5204</S>: and<S>2532</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, the heavens<S>3772</S> were opened<S>455</S> unto him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he saw<S>1492</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> of God<S>2316</S> descending<S>2597</S> like<S>5616</S> a dove<S>4058</S>, and<S>2532</S> lighting<S>2064</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>:
And<S>2532</S> lo<S>2400</S> a voice<S>5456</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> Son<S>5207</S>, in<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> I am well pleased<S>2106</S>.
